crossChainFlashRepayCallback(uint256,uin.details: Receives msAsset from L1 and use it to repay

params.swapAmountOut_: The msAsset amount received from L1 swap

crossChainLeverage(address,address,addre.details: Keep this function to avoid changing interface Refs: https://github.com/autonomoussoftware/metronome-synth/issues/877

crossChainLeverageCallback(uint256,uint2.details: Receives bridged token (aka naked token) use it to deposit

params.repayAmountMin_: The minimum amount to repay (slippage check)

retryCrossChainFlashRepayCallback(uint16.details: This function is used to recover from callback failures due to slippage

params.newRepayAmountMin_: If repayment failed due to slippage, caller may send lower newRepayAmountMin_
params.srcAddress_: The source path of failed tx
params.srcChainId_: The source chain of failed tx

retryCrossChainLeverageCallback(uint16,b.details: This function is used to recover from callback failures due to slippage

params.newDepositAmountMin_: If deposit failed due to slippage, caller may send lower newDepositAmountMin_
params.srcAddress_: The source path of failed tx
params.srcChainId_: The source chain of failed tx

CrossChainFlashRepayFinished(uint256).notice: Emitted when a cross-chain flash repay request is finalized

CrossChainFlashRepayStarted(uint256).notice: Emitted when a cross-chain flash repay request is created

CrossChainLeverageFinished(uint256).notice: Emitted when a cross-chain leverage request is finalized

CrossChainLeverageStarted(uint256).notice: Emitted when a cross-chain leverage request is created

FlashRepaid(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Emitted when debt is flash repaid

crossChainFlashRepayCallback(uint256,uin.notice: Finalize cross-chain flash debt repayment process
